title: playing video on YouTube will make screen go black, then fade into color
content: YouTube will go black at specific moments in the video before fading back to the video/ I have tried disabling hardware acceleration, different browsers, updating Firefox, clearing the cache, using a new profile, and using safe mode. I can't really show an example because it's a video

title: rechtsboven in het scherm verschijnt vaak een blanco pop-up, die onderliggende links te afschermt
content: rechtsboven in het scherm verschijnt vaak een blanco pop-up, die onderliggende links te afschermt. Onduidelijk of dit door de website komt, of in firefox zit. Opnieuw installeren van firefox helpt niet. het begon met de website volkskrant.nl, maar komt nu bij steeds meer websites voor.
creator: jtvr

title: Cannot sign into my.elementor using Firefox
content:
I'm having an issue with signing into my.elementor account using Firefox. I'm using the latest version of Firefox on Windows 11. There are no errors occurring from Firefox or anywhere else. I can sign in to my elementor account with other browsers (Chrome and Edge) no problem.

This started with the last couple of updates to Firefox. I've never had issues like this before with Firefox.

When I go to the elementor website and click on Sign In, the sign in page comes up. I normally click on the Sign in with Google. Then the Google popup shows then goes away in about 2 seconds and I am not signed into elementor. No errors at all.

Just wondering if anyone else has had this issue or can point me in the right direction to troubleshoot.

Elementor works fine when I'm building my website using Firefox.

Thank you, John P Jones
creator: jpjones55

title: Hover preview in about:config keeps resetting to true after restarting
content:
I want to turn off the hover preview feature. First I went in settings, but that disabled only the thumbnail (browser.tabs.hoverPreview.showThumbnails in about:config is set to false and saved). Then I went in about:config and manually set browser.tabs.hoverPreview.enabled to false as well, that disables the unwanted feature completely.

But every time I restart the browser it's turned back to true (just hover.Preview.enabled, not hover.Preview.showThumbnails). Can I save my settings? It's annoying that I can't opt out.
creator: jazz912x

title: I am unable to open PDF files from pCloud.
content: I am unable to open PDF files from pCloud. I can open my PDFs in other browsers, but not Firefox. I have a Linux Mint OS.

title: No suggestions when searching in the preferences?
content:
Seemingly straightforward searches through the options like:

  • "Reset firefox"
  • "Clear cookies"
  • "Empty cache"

None of these things pull up any results when searching the settings... Why?

title: restore
content: I accidentally closed Firefox with about 100 tabs open (doing research). I still had one ff window open with only one tab and I went to History (there is no session restore on my firefox-been thru that before) and selected restore recent tabs. That only opened about 10 tabs . BUT, now that becomes my " previous session" so how do I get my earlier session back. If I close FF and then open, all I get is that window with 10 useless tabs. This has happened before so I have FF set as default, and "open to previous window/tabs is selected". So how do I get my previous session open?
creator: airedalemd

title: amazon web pages not updating upon "sign in" to account.
content: Starting today, amazon web pages are not updating correctly. The amazon web page appears normal till I sign in, then it doesn't update "cart" contents or show account holders name or list any "Lists" when accessing account saved lists. I have deleted entire history, and all cookies and caches X 3. I Rebooted computer along with a "system command control reset" and still the pages are not loading correctly. Short of reinstalling "Firefox" what more can I do? Are there any "Preference" files or files with specific extensions I can delete? Thank you. Gerard
creator: gferency

title: Latest Update Will Not Save Passwords Even If The Setting is Check Marked
content: I have gone to sites that already have my stored password. The saved password is not populating. I deleted the password. When I go back to the same site, it did not ask to save my password even though the option is selected is settings. This started after the recent update.
creator: wbabcock72118
